pages.text: This block read lines from book with instructions and then by redstone signal from red input from the right side it powers wire cable by sequence that provides in line. That is continue until the programmer move to the end of book instructions. In this case programmer power green output from the left side.

The programmer's logic is cyclical so if you continue applying a pulse to the red input the programmer will start from begin. Programmer instructions are set of 16 digits or letters from A to V. One line - one set.
